I've installed everything, but when I try to run the game it says "The THPS4 Play Disk doesn't appear to be in your CD-ROM drive. Please insert it and try again".

When I try to run the game using the "Run" file in the "Crack" directory I just get an error message that says "Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 has exited because the CD #2 was not in CD drive".

Help anyone?

Oh and if it's of relevance, when I run the "Skate4" file in the "Game" subfolder of the Crack directory I get "This application has failed to start because binkw32.dll was not found. Re-installing the application may fix this problem".

thanks in advance to anyone who might help.
great torrent, all working great on my laptop with intel chipset 945 w7x86
I'm having the same problem as 'kuruimizu' can anyone tell me what to do after finished installation??
Does anyone know how i extract this?

OK. If it asks for to enter CD then download crack from here:
http://thps-mods.com/cracks.php

Now replace the original  files with cracked ones. Binkw32.dll error = re-install the game or search google to download binkw32.dll and put it in game directory.
